verses.english: In the LORD put I my trust: how say ye to my soul, Flee as a bird to your mountain?

derivation: a primitive root;  also as denominative from H5331 (נֶצַח)
strongs_def: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
gloss: excel, chief musician (singer), oversee(-r), set forward.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to flee for protection; figuratively, to confide in
gloss: have hope, make refuge, (put) trust.

derivation: also אֵיכָה ; and אֵיכָכָה ; prolonged from H335 (אַי);
strongs_def: how? or how!; also where
gloss: how, what.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

strongs_def: to nod, i.e. waver; figuratively, to wander, flee, disappear; also (from shaking the head in sympathy), to console, deplore, or (from tossing the head in scorn) taunt
gloss: bemoan, flee, get, mourn, make to move, take pity, remove, shake, skip for joy, be sorry, vagabond, way, wandering.

strongs_def: to nod, i.e. waver; figuratively, to wander, flee, disappear; also (from shaking the head in sympathy), to console, deplore, or (from tossing the head in scorn) taunt
gloss: bemoan, flee, get, mourn, make to move, take pity, remove, shake, skip for joy, be sorry, vagabond, way, wandering.

strongs_def: a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
gloss: hill (country), mount(-ain), [idiom] promotion.

strongs_def: a little bird (as hopping)
gloss: bird, fowl, sparrow.

verses.header: ¶ To the chief Musician, *A Psalm* of David.

verses.english: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow, they make ready their arrow upon the string, that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: lo!
gloss: behold, lo, see.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: to tread; by implication, to walk; also to string abow (by treading on it in bending)
gloss: archer, bend, come, draw, go (over), guide, lead (forth), thresh, tread (down), walk.

derivation: from H7185 (קָשָׁה) in the original sense (of H6983 (קוֹשׁ)) of bending;
strongs_def: a bow, forshooting (hence, figuratively, strength) or the iris
gloss: [idiom] arch(-er), [phrase] arrow, bow(-man, -shot).

strongs_def: properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
gloss: certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, [idiom] very deed.

derivation: from H2686 (חָצַץ); also by interchange for H6086 (עֵץ)
strongs_def: properly, a piercer, i.e. an arrow; by implication, a wound; figuratively, (of God) thunderbolt; the shaft of aspear
gloss: [phrase] archer, arrow, dart, shaft, staff, wound.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: properly, an overhanging, i.e. (by implication) an excess, superiority, remainder; also a small rope (as hanging free)
gloss: [phrase] abundant, cord, exceeding, excellancy(-ent), what they leave, that hath left, plentifully, remnant, residue, rest, string, with.

derivation: or (2 Chronicles 26:15) יָרָא; a primitive root;
strongs_def: properly, to flow as water (i.e. to rain); transitively, to lay or throw (especially an arrow, i.e. to shoot); figuratively, to point out (as if by aiming the finger), to teach
gloss: ([phrase]) archer, cast, direct, inform, instruct, lay, shew, shoot, teach(-er,-ing), through.

strongs_def: in, with, by, etc.
gloss: for, in into, through.

strongs_def: dusk
gloss: darkness, obscurity, privily.

strongs_def: straight (literally or figuratively)
gloss: convenient, equity, Jasher, just, meet(-est), [phrase] pleased well right(-eous), straight, (most) upright(-ly, -ness).

strongs_def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

verses.english: If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: a basis, i.e. (figuratively) political or moral support
gloss: foundation, purpose.

strongs_def: to pull down or in pieces, break, destroy
gloss: beat down, break (down, through), destroy, overthrow, pluck down, pull down, ruin, throw down, [idiom] utterly.

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

derivation: or מַה; or מָ; or מַ; also מֶה; a primitive particle;
strongs_def: properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
gloss: how (long, oft, (-soever)), (no-) thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby(-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.

strongs_def: to do or make (systematically and habitually), especially to practise
gloss: commit, (evil-) do(-er), make(-r), ordain, work(-er).

verses.english: The LORD is in his holy temple, the LORD's throne is in heaven: his eyes behold, his eyelids try, the children of men.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: probably from H3201 (יָכֹל) (in the sense of capacity);
strongs_def: a large public building, such as a palace or temple
gloss: palace, temple.

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
gloss: seat, stool, throne.

strongs_def: an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)
gloss: affliction, outward appearance, [phrase] before, [phrase] think best, colour, conceit, [phrase] be content, countenance, [phrase] displease, eye((-brow), (-d), -sight), face, [phrase] favour, fountain, furrow (from the margin), [idiom] him, [phrase] humble, knowledge, look, ([phrase] well), [idiom] me, open(-ly), [phrase] (not) please, presence, [phrase] regard, resemblance, sight, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them, [phrase] think, [idiom] us, well, [idiom] you(-rselves).

strongs_def: to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
gloss: behold, look, prophesy, provide, see.

strongs_def: an eyelash (as fluttering); figuratively, morning ray
gloss: dawning, eye-lid.

strongs_def: to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate
gloss: examine, prove, tempt, try (trial).

strongs_def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
gloss: [phrase] afflicted, age, (Ahoh-) (Ammon-) (Hachmon-) (Lev-) ite, (anoint-) ed one, appointed to, ([phrase]) arrow, (Assyr-) (Babylon-) (Egypt-) (Grec-) ian, one born, bough, branch, breed, [phrase] (young) bullock, [phrase] (young) calf, [idiom] came up in, child, colt, [idiom] common, [idiom] corn, daughter, [idiom] of first, [phrase] firstborn, foal, [phrase] very fruitful, [phrase] postage, [idiom] in, [phrase] kid, [phrase] lamb, ([phrase]) man, meet, [phrase] mighty, [phrase] nephew, old, ([phrase]) people, [phrase] rebel, [phrase] robber, [idiom] servant born, [idiom] soldier, son, [phrase] spark, [phrase] steward, [phrase] stranger, [idiom] surely, them of, [phrase] tumultuous one, [phrase] valiant(-est), whelp, worthy, young (one), youth.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

verses.english: The LORD trieth the righteous: but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

strongs_def: to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate
gloss: examine, prove, tempt, try (trial).

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: to have affection for (sexually or otherwise)
gloss: (be-) love(-d, -ly, -r), like, friend.

strongs_def: violence; by implication, wrong; by meton. unjust gain
gloss: cruel(-ty), damage, false, injustice, [idiom] oppressor, unrighteous, violence (against, done), violent (dealing), wrong.

strongs_def: to hate (personally)
gloss: enemy, foe, (be) hate(-ful, -r), odious, [idiom] utterly.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

verses.english: Upon the wicked he shall rain snares, fire and brimstone, and an horrible tempest: this shall be the portion of their cup.

strongs_def: to rain
gloss: (cause to) rain (upon).

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: a (metallic) sheet (as pounded thin); also a spring net (as spread out like a lamina)
gloss: gin, (thin) plate, snare.

strongs_def: fire (literally or figuratively)
gloss: burning, fiery, fire, flaming, hot.

strongs_def: properly, cypress-resin; by analogy, sulphur (as equally inflammable)
gloss: brimstone.

strongs_def: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
gloss: air, anger, blast, breath, [idiom] cool, courage, mind, [idiom] quarter, [idiom] side, spirit(-ual), tempest, [idiom] vain, (whirl-) wind(-y).

derivation: or זִלְעָפָהxlit zilʻâphâph corrected to zilʻâphâh; from H2196 (זָעַף);
strongs_def: a glow (of wind or anger); also a famine (as consuming)
gloss: horrible, horror, terrible.

strongs_def: an allotment (by courtesy, law or providence)
gloss: portion.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to hold together;
strongs_def: a cup (as a container), often figuratively, a lot (as if a potion); also some unclean bird, probably an owl (perhaps from the cup-like cavity of its eye)
gloss: cup, (small) owl. Compare H3599 (כִּיס).

verses.english: For the righteous LORD loveth righteousness; his countenance doth behold the upright.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: rightness (abstractly), subjectively (rectitude), objectively (justice), morally (virtue) or figuratively (prosperity)
gloss: justice, moderately, right(-eous) (act, -ly, -ness).

strongs_def: to have affection for (sexually or otherwise)
gloss: (be-) love(-d, -ly, -r), like, friend.

strongs_def: straight (literally or figuratively)
gloss: convenient, equity, Jasher, just, meet(-est), [phrase] pleased well right(-eous), straight, (most) upright(-ly, -ness).

strongs_def: to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
gloss: behold, look, prophesy, provide, see.

derivation: plural (but always as singular) of an unused noun פָּנֶה; from H6437 (פָּנָה));
strongs_def: the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
gloss: [phrase] accept, a-(be-) fore(-time), against, anger, [idiom] as (long as), at, [phrase] battle, [phrase] because (of), [phrase] beseech, countenance, edge, [phrase] employ, endure, [phrase] enquire, face, favour, fear of, for, forefront(-part), form(-er time, -ward), from, front, heaviness, [idiom] him(-self), [phrase] honourable, [phrase] impudent, [phrase] in, it, look(-eth) (-s), [idiom] me, [phrase] meet, [idiom] more than, mouth, of, off, (of) old (time), [idiom] on, open, [phrase] out of, over against, the partial, person, [phrase] please, presence, propect, was purposed, by reason of, [phrase] regard, right forth, [phrase] serve, [idiom] shewbread, sight, state, straight, [phrase] street, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them(-selves), through ([phrase] -out), till, time(-s) past, (un-) to(-ward), [phrase] upon, upside ([phrase] down), with(-in, [phrase] -stand), [idiom] ye, [idiom] you.
